alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 1:25AM CST until January 29 at 4:17PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo and Sumter Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 430 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Gainesville Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 101.0 feet, Flooding of low lying agricultural and wooded lands in the area occurs. At 109.0 feet, Flooding of some camps and cabins...as well as widespread flooding of low-lying woods and agricultural lands... occurs, especially upstream of the lock and dam. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 82.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday morning to a crest of 103.9 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 101.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
